name: The Sword of Hope II
overview: When a pack of vile demons breaks open an ancient casket to release the Dark King, an epic quest ensues. Its up to you to find the magic crystals, return stolen shards of the Earth to their rightful places, and more. The follow up to the acclaimed SWORD OF HOPE, this installment continues to follow the stories of Prince Theo and Layla (the brave warrior who hunts by submarine). Battle the elements as you try to find a passage to the Tower of Mystery. Beware the Dragon of Darkness and muster all of your courage in order to return the stolen Sword of Hope to its place. Role-playing adventure has never been this exciting, as a rich story and amazing characters mark a truly masterful game.
